name: Burgerman
description:
Originally released the 10th of October, 2012, this was a project made early in my programming career to try out some things.

Play as the top hat wearing gentleman Mr. Genté, a customer at McR's. You come there one day and notice that someone spat on your food. You go to the cashier, but they refuse to give you a refund. As revenge, you decide to eat every Waffle Pounder they have. However, Donald McR has been informed of your plan, and is now out for your money and your life. Eat as many burgers as you can before he gets to you!

This is uploaded as is, as I don't have the ability to modify the game's files anymore. No sound is mine. The song is usually known as "Ronald McDonald Insanity", and I don't remember where the sound game over sound effect came from.
